website_summaries.verdict: Choose this model if you'd like to give the .30-millimeter needles a try, but be aware of durability concerns that could affect its functionality and longevity.
pros: Distances itself from others we considered, as it has .30-millimeter needles that may work better for some types of skin

cons: One of the pricier models on our list, and it has some durability issues — the wheel squeaks and the needles dull quickly
